channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bond yields rise as traders eye tariff developments
item.description: Bond yields rose on Friday with investors paying attention to tariff news as key inflation data was set for release.

item.title: Why there’s now ‘incredible demand for physical gold’ in New York markets
item.description: A rush on physical gold, thanks to President Donald Trump’s tariff threats, has fueled a rise in prices of the precious metal to fresh record highs.

item.title: The Solar Surge: Nextracker’s Earnings Beat and What It Means for Investors

item.title: This bitcoin miner is trading at a 'deep discount' following the tech rout earlier this week, says Bernstein
item.description: Hybrid bitcoin miners were some of the hardest hit in the DeepSeek scare earlier this week.

item.title: Tech giants to turn into ‘Lagnificent 7’ as U.S. exceptionalism peaks, say Bank of America strategists
item.description: The ”Magnificent Seven” grouping of tech stocks that have powered markets is set to start lagging the market, a team of strategists says.

item.title: ‘I have a secret that’s slowly taking all the joy from my life’: I’m happily married for 25 years, but I made a big financial mistake. How do I fix this?
item.description: “Over the past couple years, I have fought to get therapy and medications to bring me back to myself.”

item.title: Apple's latest earnings beat expectations. Here's what analysts had to say
item.description: Analysts on Wall Street are responding favorably to Apple's latest quarterly results, even though its iPhone revenue came in weaker than expected.

item.title: Chevron logs its first refining loss in four years, sending stock lower
item.description: Chevron touted “record production” as well as stock buybacks and announced an increase in its quarterly dividend.

item.title: The Stock That’s Making Waves: Akero Therapeutics (AKRO)

item.title: JPMorgan says this beauty and wellness stock could be a winner in 2025
item.description: New platform and possible product launches for Oddity in the coming months could spell upside for shares, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session

item.title: D.A. Davidson tech analyst discusses megacap stocks making headlines this week
item.description: D.A. Davidson's Gil Luria joined CNBC's three-stock lunch.
